name: Dubtrack.fm - Rainbow stuff for Chillout Mixer
description: A version of the Rainbow progress bars and sliders style I made for use with the Chillout Mixer theme.
additional_info: Information A different version of my Rainbow progress bars and sliders style, intended for use with the Chillout Mixer theme I made. For more information, visit that style. The difference in this version isn't just the blue colour, but the transparent gradients used in this style allow the blue used in the original mixer theme show through a bit. The colours are somewhat muted due to this, in order to better match the more chill, relaxed vibe the Chillout Mixer community has to offer.
